articles.content: We have to ask you a simple question: Have you ever walked backward, or thought about the benefits it may have? Whether you have or not, turns out, what looks like a simple act has numerous health be… [+3274 chars]

articles.author: Lynda Charters
articles.title: Case report: Combination treatment proves effective for choroidal metastasis from breast cancer patient - Optometry Times
articles.description: According to the authors, a patient with bilateral choroid metastases from breast cancer experienced "a dramatic response" after a combination treatment of abemaciclib and fulvestrant.
articles.content: The combination treatment of abemaciclib and fulvestrant (estrogen receptor antagonist) provided a dramatic response in a patient with bilateral choroid metastases from breast cancer,1 according to s… [+3647 chars]
